channel.title: Shop Command, I need it please
channel.description: What is that command to open up shops? Could someone please give it to me or give me a link to a tut. Thanks

item.title: Shop Command, I need it please
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("shop") && playerRights >= 0) { try { int shopID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); openUpShop(shopID); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Error opening the shop."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Shop Command, I need it please
